resources.string: Home of all your favourite cuisines! Try us out today.
From breakfast, to lunch, to dinner to dessert. Prepared with love.
Login to see what we have in store for you today.
Be part of The Food Palace Community
Were you served well? were you dissatisfied with the service? At The Food Palace, our customers come first. Feel free to post your comments, complaints and ideas too.
Are you already a member? You know what to do!
If not, you can always join us. The more, the merrier!
